arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers vs Norwich City: EFL Championship Preview, Gameweek 3, 2025/26
arts.sum: After a turbulent fortnight, Norwich will want nothing more than to heal recent wounds with three more points away from home, but Blackburn will be eager to convert their own impressive road performance last time out into a first win at Ewood Park . Last Saturday, Rovers picked up their first win of 2025/26 at Hull City, with Ryan Hedges, Yūki Ōhashi, and recently-appointed club captain Todd Cantwell all getting themselves on the scoresheet.
Score predictions for every weekend game, kicking off with a Friday cracker between Leicester and Birmingham.

arts.ttl: Blackburn vs Norwich - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Blackburn Rovers and Norwich City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
